Package test.common

Interface Summary
JadeController  
OutputHandler  
 

Class Summary
ArgumentSpec Class representing the specification for a generic argument of a test group
ConfigurableAgent Generic agent that can load/unload behaviours, content languages and ontologies on request
Expectation  
HTMLManager This class contains methods to log informations into HTML document.
Logger This class contains methods and fields for handling the log process
ManualJadeController  
Test Common base class for all test classes designed to be executed within the JADE test suite framework
TesterAgent Base class for agents performing tests within the JADE test suite framework.
TestGroup Class representing a group of tests (often related to a given functionality) that have to be executed in sequence and require similar configuration, initialization and clean-up operations.
TestGroupExecutor Generic behaviour that executes the tests included in a TestGroup object
TestUtility Class including utility static methods for launching/killing agents, requesting generic AMS actions and creating remote JADE instances.
TestUtility.HostSpyAgent Inner class HostSpyAgent.
 

Exception Summary
TestException Wrapper exception for all exceptions that happens during test setup
